verses.verse: When thou goest out <WH3318> to battle <WH4421> against thine enemies <WH341>, and seest <WH7200> horses <WH5483>, and chariots <WH7393>, and a people <WH5971> more <WH7227> than thou, be not afraid <WH3372> of them: for the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> is with thee, which brought thee up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
